setting.label: Change Password Plaintext Email Body
setting.value: The password for your ${wrighting.text.domain} user account has been successfully changed. You can visit ${wrighting.cas.server.name}/welcome to log in If you did not request a new password, please contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}.

setting.label: Change Password HTML Email Body
setting.value:
The password for your ${wrighting.text.domain} user account has been successfully changed.

You can click here to log in.

If you did not request a new password, please contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}.

setting.label: New User Plaintext Email Body
setting.value:
You’ve successfully created a ${wrighting.text.domain} user account. Please keep this email for your records.
Your username is your email address.
If you forget your password, it can be reset online at ${wrighting.cas.server.name}/pwm/public/ForgottenPassword

setting.label: New User HTML Email Body
setting.value:
You’ve successfully created a ${wrighting.text.domain} user account. Please keep this email for your records.

Your username is your email address.

If you forget your password, it can be reset online here. You can also log in to the ${wrighting.text.domain} website at any time to update your account information.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}.

setting.label: New User Verification Plaintext Email Body
setting.value: Thank you for requesting a new user account for the ${wrighting.text.domain} website. Your activation token is %TOKEN%.

setting.label: New User Verification HTML Email Body
setting.value:
You’ve requested a new ${wrighting.text.domain} user account.

Please click here to complete your account registration.

If this link is not working, you can copy and paste the following code into the registration form:
%TOKEN%

If you did not request a new user account, you can safely ignore this message.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}.

setting.label: Activation Plaintext Email Body
setting.value: You’ve successfully created a ${wrighting.text.domain} user account. Please keep this email for your records. Your username is your email address. If you forget your password, it can be reset online at ${wrighting.cas.server.name}/pwm/public/ForgottenPassword

setting.label: Activation HTML Email Body
setting.value:
You’ve successfully created a ${wrighting.text.domain} user account. Please keep this email for your records.

Your username is your email address.

If you forget your password, it can be reset online here

setting.label: Activation Verification HTML Email Body
setting.value:
Thank you for requesting your account activation. To continue with your account activation, please click here to continue.

If for some reason this link doesn't work, you can copy and paste the following code onto the activation form:

%TOKEN%

If you did not request to create a new account, you do not need to take any action.

setting.label: Forgotten Password Verification Plaintext Email Body
setting.value:
You've requested a new password for your ${wrighting.text.domain} user account. To reset your password, please go to this address ${wrighting.cas.server.name}/pwm/public/ForgottenPassword/%TOKEN%. If for some reason this link doesn't work, you can copy and paste the following code onto the password reset form: %TOKEN% If you do not wish to change your password at this time, you can safely ignore this message.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}

setting.label: Forgotten Password Verification HTML Email Body
setting.value:
You've requested a new password for your ${wrighting.text.domain} user account.

To reset your password, please click here to continue.

If for some reason this link doesn't work, you can copy and paste the following code onto the password reset form:

%TOKEN%

If you do not wish to change your password at this time, you can safely ignore this message.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at ${wrighting.mail.accounts.from}

setting.label: New Guest Plaintext Email Body
setting.value: Your account has been created. Your username is: %mail% Your password is: %password%

setting.label: New Guest User HTML Email Body
setting.value:
Your account has been created.

Your username is: %mail%
Your password is: %password%

setting.label: New Guest User HTML Email Body
